casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Fred DRAVIS 305P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 13, 2018 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Dravis, Fred George.

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, L. Michael Dodd, Special Deputy Attorney General, N. Lorrin Freeman, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Amended

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 13th of September 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 13th of September 2018."
